subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Vujacic’s latest journey? A fresh start in the N.B.A. with the Knicks, where Derek Fisher and Phil Jackson hope he can provide leadership and guidance, a change from his early days with the Lakers.
snippet: Vujacic’s latest journey? A fresh start in the N.B.A. with the Knicks, where Derek Fisher and Phil Jackson hope he can provide leadership and guidance, a change from his early days with the Lakers.
